title: LSU reminds fans of Tiger Stadium policies
content:
BATON ROUGE, LA (WAFB) - 

LSU will play its first home game of the season on Saturday, so the university issued a reminder to fans about Tiger Stadium policies.

Any bag larger than 8.5" by 11" is prohibited. Coolers, ice chests, bottles (or containers of any kind) are not allowed.

Outside food and drinks, umbrellas, video cameras and weapons are banned.

LSU is a tobacco-free campus, so smoking is prohibited. Use of any tobacco product is prohibited, including cigarettes, e-cigarettes, cigars, chewing tobacco, etc.

Visitors may be subject to search. LSU will host McNeese State at 6:30 p.m.
